glow-fix.name: Glow Layering Fix
glow-fix.description:
Does some silly stuff to fix the Ship/UFO glow overlaying the entire cube in the garage, making it look more accurate to in-game. 

<cr>Shouldn't cause any issues, but disable if you encounter any with icon coloring, layering or similar.</c>

reload-btn.name: Reload Button
reload-btn.description:
Adds a button to the garage to reload the icon preview. Added for compatibility with the Separate Dual Icons mod, meant to be used after switching P1-P2 icon sets. 

 <cr>If you have a better idea for compatibility, go ahead. I'm waiting.</c>

name: Icon Preview
description: Preview your cube's position in the garage!
